702013f-a.text:
Walton Ave., west side, north from East 164th Street.
About 1927.
Ewing Galloway.

700197f-a.text:
E. 164th Street, at the northeast corner of Walton Avenue, showing the All Hallows Institute, seen from Joyce Kilmer Park. Between the Institute and the steel skeleton o f [sic] a new building on the right is a narrow clearance, the former Butternut Street,
now no longer used as a thoroughfare.
P. L. Sperr  April 10, 1941
